short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use it when Zillion of people mentiones you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to reply to multiple tweets at once. It adds a check box beside each tweets in the "Connect" page of Twitter. After selecting the tweets that you want to reply to, press the "Reply All" button, which can be found at the top of Twitter website.
